titles.title: Cutting Medicare Prescription Drug Prices in Half Act
Cutting Medicare Prescription Drug Prices in Half Act
A bill to establish a cap on costs for covered prescription drugs under Medicare parts B and D.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary:
Cutting Medicare Prescription Drug Prices in Half Act
This bill caps the cost of prescription drugs under Medicare at the amount that the Department of Veterans Affairs or the General Services Administration pays for the drug, whichever is lower.
